name: Sudoku Brawl
description:
THIS GAME IS IN INTERNAL TESTING

If you are an avid sudoku player, this game is definitely for you. 

I suggest you let a friend download the game and play against them, as the player base is low. 

Currently, I am doing sign-ups for Facebook and Instagram marketing. However, I've also decided to upload it on itch.io to also get some early responses. 

You may sign up here to let me keep you updated. <RECOMMENDED>

I'm very well reachable on Discord: https://discord.gg/tp3HreuB9Q
